scripts.init: npm install && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo install wasm-bindgen-cli && git clone --progress https://github.com/apetbrz/nclbt wasm/nclbt
scripts.dev: tmux new-session -s 'portfolio (dev)' 'npm run dev:server' \; split-window 'npm run dev:client' \; select-layout even-horizontal \;
scripts.dev:server: while true; echo 'UNIMPL.'; do sleep 5; done
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:js
scripts.start: cd server && export IS_RELEASE=1 && cargo run --release
